Class OnUpdateReadScan

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fegorsoft.alfresco.behavior.OnUpdateReadScan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.alfresco.repo.content.ContentServicePolicies.OnContentReadPolicy, org.alfresco.repo.content.ContentServicePolicies.OnContentUpdatePolicy, org.alfresco.repo.policy.ClassPolicy, org.alfresco.repo.policy.Policy
    public class OnUpdateReadScan
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.alfresco.repo.content.ContentServicePolicies.OnContentUpdatePolicy, org.alfresco.repo.content.ContentServicePolicies.OnContentReadPolicy
    Integrates antivirus scanning documents for alfresco

    Implements the policies of "OnContentUpdate" and "OnContentRead".

    The project is in: http://code.google.com/p/alfviral/

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Fernando GonzÃ¡lez (skype://fegorama)
